meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Tanzania.
meanings.sent1: In Tanzania, you can buy many things with shilingi.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for shilingi at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The monkey at the zoo tried to steal a shilingi from the donation box.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a million shilingi.
meanings.sent5: The sound of shilingi clinking in the cash register filled the market.

meanings.definition: A coin or banknote of the currency shilingi.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny shilingi on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper handed me a shilingi as change.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a shilingi out of my ear during the show.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a golden shilingi in a sea of pennies.
meanings.sent5: The old man's eyes lit up when he saw the rare shilingi in the collection.
